mapper.select: select cr_no, cr_name, cr_max, cr_checkin, cr_checkout, cr_price, cr_peak_price, cr_type from camping_room order by cr_no
mapper.update: update camping_room set cr_name = #{cr_name},cr_max= #{cr_max},cr_checkin=#{cr_checkin},cr_checkout= #{cr_checkout},cr_price=#{cr_price},cr_peak_price=#{cr_peak_price},cr_type=#{cr_type} where cr_no=#{cr_no} and cs_no = #{cs_no}
